resources.string: Verifique se o dispositivo de destino tem a função de transmissão sem fios activada. Para mais questões, veja a ajuda"
O dispositivo de destino tem de ligar a transmissão sem fios
Ligue o Wi-Fi e o Bluetooth para utilizar a transmissão sem fios
Apenas pode transmitir fotos, vídeos ou música
Autorize a transmissão na sua TV primeiro
Não foi possível autorizar a transmissão na sua TV. Aguarde um momento e tente novamente

Transmissão é a projecção de itens do seu telefone para um ecrã externo maior. Isto permite que partilhe imagens e vídeos com os seus amigos e família. O consumo de bateria normalmente não é afectado ao utilizar esta funcionalidade
Como é que eu transmito itens para um ecrã maior?

"1. Use the small millet hand phone to connect to the small millet TV, you can establish a vertical screen connection without the network environment. 2. Some Xiaomi TVs or other brand TVs that do not support smart screening, you need to connect your TV (or large screen device) to your mobile phone to the same wireless network."

3. Some Xiaomi TVs or other brand TVs that do not support smart screening. If there is no wireless network, or if the TV and mobile phone cannot connect to the same network,you need to turn on the TV (or large screen device) [Miracast] Mirror projection screen] switch. This name may vary for different brands of TV, you can slide to the bottom of this page to learn more.
"Tap the \"Cast\" toggle on your phone's Notification shade. Turn on both WLAN and Bluetooth for a more stable connection."
If you want to cast items from Gallery or Mi Video, you can use built-in casting features in these apps.
Seleccione um dispositivo da lista de dispositivos disponíveis para começar a transmitir

"1. Millet TV screencast, please upgrade the Wireless Screening application in the TV application list to the latest version. 2. You can try to connect your phone to your TV to the same LAN to increase your connection success rate. However, some routers may not be able to provide a stable connection environment for the screen, resulting in no connection or frequent interruption. 3. If you're using Mi TV, turning on Bluetooth might improve the connection. 4. If there aren't any WLAN networks available, make sure your external device (e.g. TV) supports Miracast functionality. The names of casting features on your external device may vary depending on the brand of your device. Refer to the information below to learn about Miracast functionality on different devices."

"Xiaomi mobile phone can directly connect to most of the Xiaomi TV with Bluetooth tooth function, instead of manually opening the Miracast function. If you need to manually open the Miracast function, you can press the [Menu] button of the TV remote control to select me on the TV screen. Applications > Wireless Screening > Millet / Android Miracas."

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can press the [SOURCE] button on the remote control and then select \"Screen Mirroring\". This feature is turned on by default on various models.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. This feature is turned on by default on various models.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. This feature is turned on by default on various models.

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can press the [MENU] button on the remote control and then select Settings > Connection > Network > Multiple screens.

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can press the [SMART] button on the remote control and then select Casting > Wireless Display;Some models can click Hi Screen > Game Screening > Android.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can select Apps > Casting > Android device > Miracast.

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can press the [SOURCE] button on the remote control and then select \"Screen Mirroring\";Some models can be selected by the network > WIFIDirect setting; This feature is turned on by default on various models.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can select Apps > Screen Mirroring.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can select System > System Tools > Multiple Screens > Screen Mirroring.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can select Apps > Wireless Display.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. To turn this feature on, go to My Apps > WLAN Display.
Please make sure that your large screen device model supports the Miracast protocol. On some models, select Settings > Network > Multi-screen Interactive > Wireless Display.
Se a marca do seu dispositivo não estiver listada, contacte o fabricante para saber mais
Minimizar a janela para poder utilizar outras funcionalidades enquanto transmite
Não interromper a transmissão quando o ecrã estiver desligado. Esta funcionalidade pode aumentar o consumo de bateria
Não transmitimos notificações flutuantes, notificações de chamadas recebidas ou outros itens que possam conter informações pessoais
A transmissão não vai ser interrompida quando o ecrã desligar. Prima o botão Ligar/Desligar para voltar a ligar o ecrã
Não é possível transmitir no modo ecrã dividido
Utilize a janela para transmitir o ecrã na aplicação
